data.name: Centiskorch

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

data.name: Centiskorch V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Radiating Heat
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Centiskorch VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Centiferno
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you did any damage with this attack, you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.name: Centiskorch

attacks.name: Hundred Foot Flames
attacks.text: For each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

data.name: Centiskorch

abilities.name: Overheater
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent flips a coin for their Burned Pokémon during Pokémon Checkup, it doesn't recover from that Special Condition even if the result is heads.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

data.name: Centiskorch

attacks.name: Coil
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's attacks do 90 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

data.name: Centiskorch

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Charring Breath
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't Burned, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

attacks.name: Billowing Heat Wave
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Coiling Crush
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
